answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some resources you may find helpful.
This is a link to previously asked and answered Knowledge Network question about ADA revisions.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/question/21182
This article looks at common issues that arise when working on ADA requirements.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/7041/The_ADA_and_City_Governments_Common_Problems
This document is a Guide to ADA Regulations from Washoe County, NV.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/6103/Guide_to_ADA_Regulations
I also included an article about how the City of Bellevue adapted to ADA requirements.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/100135/Bellevues_Development_of_Asset_Management_Technologies_for_ADA_Compliance
Below are a few sample transition plans from different cities.
San Diego, CA
http://www.sandiego.gov/disabilityservices/pdf/transitionplan1.pdf
Concord, CA
http://www.ci.concord.ca.us/pw/ada/
Topeka, KS
http://www.topeka.org/ada_plan_review.shtml
Bloomington, IN
http://bloomington.in.gov/documents/viewDocument.php?document_id=4835
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

Ali Iannolo

author: Quentin McPhatter
text:
Does anyone have a copy of an ADA Transition Plan that they would be willing to e-mail to me at qmcphatter@kingslandgeorgia.com or provide via an electronic link?
Thanks so much in advance for your assistance!
Quentin McPhatter
Deputy City Manager
Kingsland, Georgia
title: ADA Transition Plan
